name: Eternal Soul ~ First Arc
description:
Eternal Soul

When someone died, they may trade their soul for the new life.

However, when their soul is missing, what become of their right as living being?

The girl awakes in the soaring thunder to search her reason for living the second time.

And so, her adventure begins.

Disclaimer

This is a free to play game, aside from my own assets are owned by their respective owners.

Eternal Soul v1.1

This is the updated version from original 2008 version. The updates mostly due to rewording the scripts and tweaking battle gameplays to be more balanced.

Language: English
